message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I’ve been gambling a lot recently, and I think I need to take a break. How can I self-exclude from my account?

I completely understand, and I want to assure you that support is available. Let’s run through security so I can assist you with the self-exclusion process. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Mark Johnson, my email is mark.j@example.com, and my date of birth is October 8, 1987.

Thanks, Mark. That's all correct! I can help you with self-exclusion. This will prevent you from accessing your account for a chosen period, and you won’t be able to log in or place any bets during that time.
Okay, how long can I self-exclude for?
You can choose to self-exclude for a period of 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, or 5 years. Once the self-exclusion is applied, it cannot be reversed until the selected period ends.
I think I'll go with 1 year. What do I need to do to set it up?

Understood. I can process the self-exclusion for you now, or you can activate it yourself by visiting the 'Responsible Gaming' section in your account settings. Would you like me to proceed with the request?
Please process it for me now.

I've processed your 1-year self-exclusion request. You will receive a confirmation email shortly, and your account will be restricted immediately. If you need support during this time, I recommend contacting organizations such as GamCare or GambleAware for professional advice.
Thanks for your help. I think this will be good for me.
You're very welcome, Mark. I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Take care and remember that support is always available.
